keywords.cdata: Diesel engine power; Diesel fuels; Electric power plants; Electricity; Energy consumption; Energy demand; Energy supply; Power distribution; Power generation; Substations; Telecommunications; Transmission lines,,

project_abstract.cdata: The Second Power Project for Haiti will include: (i) the expansion of the Varreux power station at Port-au-Prince by the addition of 22-23 MW of diesel capacity, addition of 3.5 MW of capacity to the Cap Haitian power station, 1 MW for Port-de-Paix and 250 kW for a new power station at Miragoane; (ii) expansion of seven substations constructed under the First Project, construction of three new substations and acquisition of telecommunications equipment; (iii) construction of 27 km of distribution lines, rehabilitation of about 30 percent of the distribution network in Port-au-Prince and expansion of the distribution networks in Port-de-Paix (16 km), Les Cayes (10 km) and Miragoane (18 km); (iv) staff training; and (v) related consultant services.
